attributes.action: Honour the legal default of Article 50 in the event of no agreement, No Deal.
attributes.background: In 2016 a referendum took place, and as such MPs approved the government to trigger Article 50. The process to exit the European Union. At that time it was noted that if no agreement can he made between the UK and the EU by 29th March 2019, the UKs legal default is No Deal. We ask Mps to honour this
